"Ronaldeen's Tasks":
"The Tasks that can be accepted from Ronaldeen, the ARKS Senior Training Instructor, are more challenging than other Tasks, with more difficult or time-consuming objectives.

When you complete one of Ronaldeen's Tasks, the next Task will be accepted automatically."

"Like Liu Mei, Ronaldeen is touring the ARKS bases in each region, such as Central City in Aelio.

Her Tasks can be accepted from her at any location in which she appears."

"ロナルディンは、セントラルシティなど
各リージョンのアークス拠点を巡回しています。"
